mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrBnefPymntHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MBR_NO , BNEF_PYMNT_TURN , BNEF_SN , BNEF_DETAIL_TURN , MALL_ID , LANG_CD , DVC_CD , MOBILE_APP_SECT_CD , BNEF_PYMNT_TP_CD , PNT_PYMNT_AMT , PRM_NO , RECOMENDR_MBR_NO , RECOMENDE_MBR_NO , PYMNT_DT , BF_PYMNT_MBR_NO , TGT_MBR_TP_CD , TGT_MBR_ATRB_CD , BNEF_PYMNT_SUCCES_YN , BNEF_PYMNT_FAILR_RESN_CONT , TGT_MBR_IP , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_BNEF_PYMNT_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND MBR_NO = #{mbrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND BNEF_PYMNT_TURN = #{bnefPymntTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
